title: AAI Recruitment 2026 - Apply for 02 Medical Consultant Posts
description: Airports Authority of India (AAI) has released an official notification for the recruitment of 02 Medical Consultants posts. Candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the AAI Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are looking for more, here is a lis...
